para: mysqlmysql is a database server that understands Structured Query Language (SQLSQL). MySQL was developed by the Swedish Company MySQL AB. The first release was in 1995. In 2008 MySQL AB was bought by Sun Microsystems (which is now owned by Oracle).

mysql is very popular for websites in combination with phpphp and apache (the M in LAMPLAMP servers), but mysql is also used in organizations with huge databases like Facebook, Flickr, Google, Nokia, Wikipedia and Youtube.
This chapter will teach you sql by creating and using small databases, tables, queries and a simple trigger in a local mysql server.
